fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
EU zoos directive 
EU invasive alien species directive 
EU habitats directive 
EU birds directive
organisation_name: British and Irish Association of Zoos and Aquariums (BIAZA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: BIAZA is the professional association for zoos and aquariums within the UK and Ireland.  We work to lead and support our members to achieve their goals in animal welfare, conservation, education and research.  We provide a range of resources for our members to ensure that they achieve the highest levels of professional excellence possible.
